Title: Dance Moms
Actors: Abby Lee Miller, 	Madison Ziegler, Chloe Lukasiak, Kendall Vertes, Mackenzie Ziegler, Paige Hyland, Brooke Hyland, Nia Fraizer, 	Kelly Hyland, Christi Lukasiak, Gianna Martello , Holly Frazier
Plot: Set in Pittsburgh's renowned Abby Lee Dance Company, owned and operated by notoriously demanding and passionate instructor Abby Lee Miller, the series follows children's early steps on the road to stardom, and their doting mothers who are there for every rehearsal, performance and bow...all under the discerning eye of Miller. Seeing the highs and lows surrounding competition season delivers an intriguing and dramatic look at the cast's frantic pursuit of the ultimate National Dance title.
